description: A Java class defining FloatIPC, an implementation of ObjectIPC for handling Float values with JSON serialization and deserialization.

classes.name: FloatIPC
classes.description: Implements ObjectIPC to handle Float values with JSON serialization/deserialization.

methods.name: FloatIPC(float val)
methods.description: Constructor to set initial float value.

methods.name: toJSON()
methods.description: Converts the object to a JSON representation.

methods.name: fromJSON(JSONObject buffer)
methods.description: Populates the object state from a JSON object.
